comments.body:
Have you look at this: https://github.com/kubernetes/kube-openapi/tree/master/pkg/util/proto

Just want to make sure you explored the idea of sharing this parser with the code there if there is any chance. I am not expert on that code and not even sure if the parser is there. If you are aware of that package, just ignore this comment.

This is basically just a wrapper for that, which creates models using kube-openapi/pkg/util/proto.NewOpenAPIData(doc) and converts a schema.GroupVersionKind to the modelname accepted by kube-openapi/pkg/util/proto.LookupModel
